pageContext.claim: “I really don't want to be talking about an opponent in a negative way. Hard to believe. It's me talking, but that's true. ”
pageContext.analysis: This is nonsense. The Trump campaign has run almost constant attack ads. He nicknamed Biden “Sleepy Joe” early in the election and continues to attack the former vice president with false claims about his family and record. Moreover, Trump is famous for nicknaming his opponents.
